Package ohos.utils

Class CapabilityConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.utils.CapabilityConstants
  • Deprecated. 
    As of api version 5, replaced by SystemCapability

    @Deprecated
public final class CapabilityConstants
extends Object
    Defines the hardware capabilities and software capabilities used in the system.

    The standard capability name is in the format of ohos.xxx.xxx, ohos.xxx.xxx.xxx, or huawei.ohos.xxx.xxx, for example, ohos.hardware.bluetooth for CAPABILITY_BLUETOOTH and ohos.hardware.camera.front for CAPABILITY_CAMERA_FRONT.

      • CAPABILITY_SOFT_DISTRIBUTEDDATAMGR_DATAUSAGE

        @Deprecated
public static final String CAPABILITY_SOFT_DISTRIBUTEDDATAMGR_DATAUSAGE
        Deprecated. 
        Indicates the device storage management capability.

        This capability is implemented by the APIs provided in the ohos.data.usage package. Currently, wearables do not support the capability.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CAPABILITY_SOFT_DISTRIBUTEDDATAMGR_DISTRIBUTEDFILE

        @Deprecated
public static final String CAPABILITY_SOFT_DISTRIBUTEDDATAMGR_DISTRIBUTEDFILE
        Deprecated. 
        Indicates the distributed file access capability.

        This capability is implemented by the APIs provided in the ohos.data.distributed.file package. Currently, wearables do not support the capability.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CAPABILITY_SOFT_DISTRIBUTEDDATAMGR_SEARCH

        @Deprecated
public static final String CAPABILITY_SOFT_DISTRIBUTEDDATAMGR_SEARCH
        Deprecated. 
        Indicates the in-application search and global search capabilities.

        The capabilities are implemented by the APIs provided in the ohos.data.search package. Currently, wearables do not support the capabilities.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
